%title R programming with Sun Grid Engine

Use Rsge package to perfom paralle computing with SGE.

{{{class="brush: r"
index = 1:100
func1 <- function(x) x+1
func <- function(x, arg) func1(x, arg)

jobs = lapply(index, function(x) sge.submit(func=func, x=x, arg=arg, function.savelist=c('func1')))
status = lapply(jobs, sge.job.status)

while(any(status==1)) {
    Sys.sleep(4)
    status = lapply(jobs, sge.job.status)
}

results = lapply(jobs, sge.list.get.result)
}}}
